name: 21.87cm per Second
description:
21.87cm per Second

- My entry for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022 🍂 -

Fly around and enjoy the fall in this cozy little "rhythm" game !
Made to be as cozy as possible and more of atmospheric experience really, as the gameplay is limited to a minimum.
My first gam jam in solo and my first try at modeling, hope you like it and don't hesitate to comment any feedbacks !

How to play

A/D or arrow keys or controller, but really you'll only need 2 buttons so keyboard works great.

Just collect every note as you fall !

Credits

Music by Benjamin Tissot found on Bensound.com.

Wind sounds found on SoundBible.com.

Skybox found on the asset store.

The rest is by me. 

Thanks for playing !
